description: Non material amendment of planning application PP/2014/6329 dated 29/01/2015 for 'construction of seven, two storey terraced houses with roofspace accommodation, associated access, landscaping and refuse storage (following demolition of two semi-detached dwellings)' (Alterations of french doors to form windows; bi-folding units to form french doors and brick road surface to form tarmac surface)
decision_conditions: The amendments hereby submitted represents non-material amendments of the planning permission ref: PP/2014/6329 dated 29/01/2015 for amendments to fenestration at rear elevation and external pavement materials, for the following reasons:

The description and nature of the development would remain unchanged; - The size of the resulting scheme would remain unchanged; - There is no significant decrease in the number of, increase in size of, or change in location of openings; - There would be no material impact on any neighbours or other statutory and non-statutory bodies; - The changes would not compromise the overall design and appearance of the development; - The changes do not result in a poorer design by loss of detail or lower quality materials; - The changes do not result in the scheme becoming contrary to the adopted policies of the council; and - The resulting scheme does not conflict with any existing planning conditions remainder of the development to be developed as approved.
